Module com.example.a50zo
Package com.example.a50zo.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.example.a50zo.model.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
HumanPlayer, MachinePlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
Abstract class representing a player in the Cincuentazo game. Contains common functionality for both human and machine players.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cincuentazo Team

    • selectCard

      public abstract Card selectCard(int currentSum) throws InvalidCardPlayException
      Abstract method to select a card to play. Implementation differs for human and machine players.
      Parameters:
      currentSum - The current sum on the table
      Returns:
      The selected card to play
      Throws:
      InvalidCardPlayException - if no valid card can be played
